QuestData.Title: Hunting the Huntmaster
QuestData.Description:
I heard from one of the guards in Camp Nowhere that there's a nasty piece of work mutilating the local wildlife. Calls itself a 'huntmaster'.
Hunting is one thing, but I can't abide torturing any living thing.
Besides, my wagon could use a good luck charm.
<Nesingwary spits over the side.>
Bring me back its paw.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A wicked gnoll who takes great pleasure in torturing innocent wildlife.
QuestData.LogDescription: Hunt down Huntmaster Krakle around Imbu's Shield.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Hemet Nesingwary Jr. in Camp Nowhere.
